Private Events
Home
|
Groups & Parties
|
Private Events
BOOK YOUR NEXT PRIVATE EVENT AT LALA KARAOKE!
Birthday Party, Bachelor/Bachelorette Party, Team Building, Corporate Event, Rehearsal Dinner, Wedding…
We Can Customized All of Your Inquiries Offering A delicious Catering Menu, a Full Bar and A Memorable Entertainment!
You can Privatized the Whole Rooftop Bar Area and The Private Karaoke Rooms.
Our Patio is Also Available to Book For Private Event and Offer Direct Access to the Downstairs Bar and Activity Garden.
Looking For a Fun and Unforgettable Experience, Call us Now at (727) 803-6519 for our St. Pete location or (813) 253-3578 for our Tampa location.
Seeking an exceptional team-building activity?
Enhance your private event by incorporating our Karaoke Rooms. Karaoke fosters a laid-back and casual atmosphere, allowing team members to unwind and enjoy each other’s company. It promotes camaraderie by breaking down barriers and fostering a sense of ease among team members, facilitating interaction and communication.
Make a Reservation
Karaoke Rooms
Dining Reservation

Corporate Events/Team Building
Home
|
Groups & Parties
|
Corporate Events/Team Building
LALA Corporate Events and Team-Building in Tampa Bay
Your search for the perfect place for a fun corporate dinner or team-building activity in Tampa Bay, just got simpler. LALA offers plenty of options to motivate your group in unique, entertaining, and delicious ways.
From our private event and karaoke rooms to our world-class restaurant starring fare with a flair, LALA promises the right ambiance to complement your indoor or outdoor team-building activities and goals.
Call
(727) 803-6519
for LALA St. Pete or
(813) 250-9245
for LALA Tampa. You can also email us at contact@lalastpete.com or contact@lalatampa.com.
Your Destination for Team Building
We designed the LALA layout to offer a little bit of everything — that’s what makes it perfect for any corporate team-building escape.
Choose any of our comfortable spaces as the launching pad for your team-building activities. At LALA, team building doesn’t have to end when the workday’s over.
Interested in arranging a laid-back adventure for your teammates? In need of the ideal restaurant for a sophisticated corporate dinner? Call our event planning staff now to design your perfect team-building day or evening.
Private Rooms for Corporate Retreats
Never underestimate the power of spending a corporate retreat off-site. Employees feel less constrained when they’re in a casual yet upscale atmosphere.
Our private karaoke rooms
have been designed for maximum convenience, and they’re all equipped with the technology you need to introduce karaoke into your team-building agenda.
Karaoke remains one of the best ways to loosen people up and allow them to come out of their shells. Belting out tunes can be a terrific icebreaker activity — you’ll never feel the same way about your introverted finance director after hearing her tackle an Ariana Grande classic.
book now

Restaurant
View Our Menu
Private
Karaoke Rooms
Book Now
Ready
To Eat?
Reserve a Table
Restaurants and Bars for Open-Air and Indoors Enjoyment
Fuel your team-building activities in Tampa and St. Pete the mouthwatering way. Our restaurant serves up traditional American pub fare as well as fresh, higher-end dishes inspired by Europe’s finest culinary centers, including the French countryside and the Mediterranean. Our Two bars are ready to complement your cuisine with a full array of libations, including cocktails, wine, champagne, and mixed drinks.
Whether you’re wowing clients, honoring a retiring colleague, or celebrating the holidays with a team-building dinner, make LALA your go-to restaurant.
View Our Menu
reserve a Table
Enjoy Team Building at Its Finest in the Activity Garden
Want to get your coworkers or customers together in a more casual location? The patio at our St. Petersburg location presents a welcome opportunity for everyone to grab a craft cocktail or on-tap ale.
In the
outdoor Activity Garden
, your team will find tons of activities suitable for sparking conversations. From traditional French boules to cornhole our outdoor games always impress.
Make your next corporate party or team bonding session an event everyone will remember. Reserve a table or room at LALA now!
reserve a table
